ads.Title: How has studying been?
ads.Description: Hi, I'm Yemi. I presume you've either done your exam or yet to. If you're yet to, then this is for you. Studying is'nt so easy, but trust me the end result is always worth it. This is the best time to work on whatever score you desire before it's too late. All things are possible, it's just a matter of one's state of mind. You can do it, I know you will!!. Best of luck friend!

ads.Title: Indomietable Chicken
ads.Description: These are the days of the prophet. All they are saying is that you do the way of the lord and do it well. No questions are asked. Just do it
